meanings.definition: Shaped like a ring or circle.
meanings.sent1: The tree had an annular pattern on its trunk.
meanings.sent2: The bracelet had an annular design with small diamonds encircling it.
meanings.sent3: The annular cake looked like a giant donut!
meanings.sent4: The sun's rays created an annular halo around the moon.
meanings.sent5: The annular rainbow formed a perfect circle in the sky.

meanings.definition: Resembling a ring in form or structure.
meanings.sent1: The old well had an annular stone wall around it.
meanings.sent2: The planet Saturn has an annular appearance due to its rings.
meanings.sent3: The annular flower bed made the garden look like a fairy ring.
meanings.sent4: The fortress had an annular layout, with walls forming a protective circle.
meanings.sent5: The annular pattern on the carpet added a touch of elegance to the room.
